ROOT.name: The Modern World
ROOT.desc: A map of the entire world with all nations available.
ROOT.intro: Through your wise and skillful leadership, you have united the $TRIBENAME0 under your command. Now you must crush all who would oppose you under the iron rule of your mighty nation. Barbarian hordes and rival nations alike will fall as you set forth to CONQUER THE WORLD.
ROOT.victory_conditions: Through conquest, coercion, and shrewd dealing, gain control over the entire world.

STYLE.title: Liberation
STYLE.description: The enemy has hired rebels to take control of your territory. Win this battle by defeating any of them or hold out for $NUM0 minutes.

STYLE.title: Besieged
STYLE.objective: Capture all enemy capitals or hold out for 60 minutes.
STYLE.description: You are besieged by the enemy and local rebels. You are not able to establish new cities. But fortunately, these enemies are one age behind you.

STYLE.title: Melee
STYLE.objective: Capture all enemy capitals or hold out for 120 minutes.
STYLE.description: The enemy has instigated opposition powers in this region to fight against you. You have one loyal supporter to help you resist this invasion. Because our undercovers are hidden in rebels, we can get information about them.

STYLE.title: Guerrilla Warfare
STYLE.objective: Destroy 40 enemy units.
STYLE.description: The enemy has taken several of your cities. Their morale is not very high, however if enough of their men are eliminated they will likely retreat.

STYLE.title: Conquest
STYLE.objective: Capture the enemy capital(s) or hold out for $NUM0 minutes.
STYLE.description: You are being invaded by a treacherous neighbor. Take the enemy capital(s) or hold off their assault for $NUM0 minutes to force them to withdraw.

STYLE.title: Airlift
STYLE.objective: Defend your base.
STYLE.description: Your only supply comes in the form of air drops. For every bomber that lands at your Airbase, you will gain resources. Use these resources to defend your base until the timer expires.

STYLE.title: Surprise Attack!
STYLE.objective: Defend your capital for 15 minutes.
STYLE.description: Your enemy has launched a surprise attack on this territory. Hold off the attackers and defend your capital to achieve victory.

STYLE.title: Ambush
STYLE.objective: Find and capture the enemy's capital or hold out for 90 minutes.
STYLE.description: Your army has reached the largest enemy settlement in this territory. Capture the capital in 90 minutes and the territory will fall. The enemy leader is crafty, so beware of ambush by the enemy troops.

STYLE.title: Overwhelm
STYLE.objective: Capture the enemy capital(s), control 75% of the territory or hold out for $NUM0 minutes.
STYLE.description: You are being invaded by a treacherous neighbor. There are also several barbarians in your territory. The barbarians will immediately bow to anybody who captures their captial. Take their Capital(s) in $NUM0 minutes or less or control 75% of the territory, or hold off their assault for $NUM0 minutes to force them to withdraw. You will lose if any of them controls 60% of the territory.

STYLE.title: Mercenary
STYLE.objective: Hold off the enemy until the timer expires.
STYLE.description: The enemy has hired a group of opposition powers in this region to destroy you. Survive until the timer expires to win.

STYLE.title: Hideaway
STYLE.objective: Eliminate all enemy Generals or control 80% of the territory.
STYLE.description: The enemy's army is tied up elsewhere, so they have hired mercenaries. These mercenaries can survive without a City and they suffer no attrition. To find them will require some careful scouting; they are aware of your presence and will certainly set up ambushes. And beware--they will raid your homeland relentlessly.
STYLE.victory_text: You have rooted out the brigands.

STYLE.title: Blitzkrieg
STYLE.objective: Capture the enemy capital(s) in 25 minutes.
STYLE.description: You have launched a surprise invasion aiming to get a swift victory. Each built military building will give you extra military units. You must take down the enemy in short time or your plan will miscarry.

STYLE.title: Melee
STYLE.objective: Capture all enemy capitals in 120 minutes.
STYLE.description: The enemy has several supporters in this region. The opposition leader has joined you to help defeat the enemy and its supporters. Because our undercovers are hidden in rebels, we can get information about them.

STYLE.title: Overwhelm
STYLE.objective: Capture the enemy capital(s) in $NUM0 minutes or control 75% of the territory.
STYLE.description: The enemy is resisting your invasion. There are also several barbarian tribes in enemy's territory. The barbarians will immediately bow to anybody who captures their captial. Take their Capital(s) in $NUM0 minutes or less or control 75% of the territory. You will lose if any of them controls 60% of the territory.

STYLE.title: Airlift
STYLE.objective: Defend your base.
STYLE.description: Your only supply comes in the form of air drops. For every bomber that lands at your Airbase, you will gain resources. Use these resources to defend your base until the timer expires.

STYLE.title: Conquest
STYLE.objective: Capture the enemy capital(s) in $NUM0 minutes.
STYLE.description: The enemy is resisting your invasion. Take their Capital(s) in $NUM0 minutes or less to win.

STYLE.title: Hideaway
STYLE.objective: Eliminate all enemy Generals or control 80% of the territory.
STYLE.description: The enemy's army is tied up elsewhere, so they have hired mercenaries. These mercenaries can survive without a City and they suffer no attrition. To find them will require some careful scouting; they are aware of your presence and will certainly set up ambushes. And beware--they will raid your homeland relentlessly.
STYLE.victory_text: You have rooted out the brigands.

STYLE.title: Liberation
STYLE.description: Help the rebels seize control of the country.

STYLE.title: Tech Raid
STYLE.objective: Capture the enemy capital.
STYLE.description: You have made haste to arrive in this territory. However, you went so fast that you left behind all your librarians. You'll have to steal technologies from your enemies using Spies to infiltrate their Library. Take the enemy technology and use it to crush them!

STYLE.title: Guerrilla Bases
STYLE.objective: Destroy the guerrilla encampments.
STYLE.description: Root out the guerrilla forces in this province to quash all resistance and gain control of the land.

STYLE.title: Ambush
STYLE.objective: Find and capture the enemy's capital in 90 minutes.
STYLE.description: Your army has reached the largest enemy settlement in this territory. Capture the capital in 90 minutes and the territory will fall. The enemy leader is crafty, so beware of ambush by the enemy troops.

STYLE.title: Surprise Attack!
STYLE.objective: Defend your capital for 15 minutes.
STYLE.description: Your enemy has launched a surprise attack on this territory. Hold off the attackers and defend your capital to achieve victory.

STYLE.title: Pillage
STYLE.objective: Destroy the enemy buildings.
STYLE.description: Your army is approaching the enemy's army. Attack their encampment and destroy all their civilian buildings in order to win.

STYLE.title: Skirmish
STYLE.objective: Destroy the enemy Redoubts.
STYLE.description: This battle is almost entirely a military engagement. You can only build limited kinds of buildings. Also, all your unit production will come from your Redoubt, Barracks, Auto Plant, Factory and Anchorage. Gain more resources by building more Redoubts and using the economic units you can build.

STYLE.title: Assault
STYLE.objective: Capture the enemy capital(s) in $NUM0 minutes.
STYLE.description: You arrive enemy's territory, but you take little supply so you are an age behind your enemy. Find a place to build the city and army. You will regain your age according to the difficulty. Take their Capital(s) in $NUM0 minutes or less to win.

STYLE.title: Guerrilla Warfare
STYLE.objective: Destroy 40 enemy units.
STYLE.description: The enemy soldiers in this area tire of the occupation and their morale is failing. If your attack is fierce enough, they will likely retreat.

STYLE.title: Bribery
STYLE.objective: Capture the enemy capital(s).
STYLE.description: A group of Spies has been sent into Enemy's territory. Its mission is to take over this territory by bribing enemy units to join your side and then using them to attack the enemy capital.

STYLE.title: Speech of the Supreme Leader
STYLE.description: The Supreme Leader wants to spread his concepts to people on this land. He must be protected until his speed was heard by everyone.
STYLE.victory_text: You have protected the Supreme Leader!
STYLE.defeat_text: You have failed to protect the Supreme Leader!

STYLE.title: Blitzkrieg
STYLE.objective: Capture the enemy capital(s) in 25 minutes.
STYLE.description: You have launched a surprise invasion aiming to get a swift victory. Each built military building will give you extra military units. You must take down the enemy in short time or your plan will miscarry.

STYLE.title: Besieged
STYLE.objective: Capture all enemy capitals or hold out for 60 minutes.
STYLE.description: You have taken control of this territory, but you are besieged by local guerrilla forces. You are not able to establish new cities. But fortunately, these enemies are one age behind you.

STYLE.title: Barbarian Rally
STYLE.objective: Defend your capital for 15 minutes.
STYLE.description: Your armies encountered no resistance in taking the territory. However, the natives have rallied and are assaulting your new outpost. Defend your capital until the timer expires to win.

STYLE.title: Sudden Death
STYLE.objective: Capture one city from each nation to defeat them in $NUM0 minutes.
STYLE.description: The barbarian nations in this region are weak and sure to kneel to your nation if you are able to prove your superiority by capturing one of their cities in $NUM0 minutes. They must capture your capital to defeat you.

STYLE.title: Wheel and Deal
STYLE.objective: Defeat the barbarian tribes in 120 minutes.
STYLE.description: There are several native tribes in this territory vying for power. Use your diplomatic skills to play them off of each other and ensure your own dominance in the area. Defeat the barbarian tribes in 120 minutes.

STYLE.title: Barbarians at the Gates!
STYLE.objective: Hold off the enemy until the timer expires.
STYLE.description: A group of barbarian tribes in this region have united together to destroy you. Fortunately you brought extra supplies and the barbarians are an Age behind you. Survive until the timer expires to win.

STYLE.title: Food for the Winter
STYLE.description: You have established a settlement in this region. Now the winter is fast approaching. Make sure your people have enough food to survive the harsh cold.
STYLE.defeat_text: Your people are going to starve.

STYLE.title: Federation
STYLE.description: There are several native tribes in the area. Conquer them before they band together into one federation.

STYLE.title: Hideaway
STYLE.objective: Eliminate all enemy Generals or control 80% of the territory.
STYLE.description: The enemy's army is tied up elsewhere, so they have hired mercenaries. These mercenaries can survive without a City and they suffer no attrition. To find them will require some careful scouting; they are aware of your presence and will certainly set up ambushes. And beware--they will raid your homeland relentlessly.
STYLE.victory_text: You have rooted out the brigands.

STYLE.title: Settlers
STYLE.objective: Destroy or ally with the enemy nations.
STYLE.description: You have sent settlers to an unexplored region of the New World. There are many other nations on their way as well, but you have arrived first. Use your head start to build up your nation in preparation to battle the other tribes.

STYLE.title: Airlift
STYLE.objective: Defend your base.
STYLE.description: Your only supply comes in the form of air drops. For every bomber that lands at your Airbase, you will gain resources. Use these resources to defend your base until the timer expires.

STYLE.title: Guerrilla Bases
STYLE.objective: Destroy the guerrilla encampments.
STYLE.description: Root out the guerrilla forces in this province to quash all resistance and gain control of the land.

STYLE.title: Mercantile
STYLE.description: You are competing with other nations to establish trade dominance in this area. This will be a fierce battle for rare resources. Since this is not all out war, attrition will be disabled for this battle. Protect your resources well, and raid your enemy's often, in order to win.
STYLE.victory_text: You have won the trade war.
STYLE.defeat_text: You have lost the trade war.

STYLE.title: Pillage
STYLE.objective: Destroy the enemy buildings.
STYLE.description: Your army is approaching a local force. Attack their encampment and destroy all their civilian buildings in order to win.

STYLE.title: Skirmish
STYLE.objective: Destroy the enemy Redoubts.
STYLE.description: This battle is almost entirely a military engagement. You can only build limited kinds of buildings. Also, all your unit production will come from your Redoubt, Barracks, Auto Plant, Factory and Anchorage. Gain more resources by building more Redoubts and using the economic units you can build.

STYLE.title: Guerrilla Warfare
STYLE.objective: Destroy 40 enemy units.
STYLE.description: The enemy soldiers in this area tire of the occupation and their morale is failing. If your attack is fierce enough, they will likely retreat.

STYLE.title: Bribery
STYLE.objective: Capture the enemy capital(s).
STYLE.description: A group of Spies has been sent into Enemy's territory. Its mission is to take over this territory by bribing enemy units to join your side and then using them to attack the enemy capital.

STYLE.title: Nomad
STYLE.description: You have successfully established a new settlement but several nomadic tribes also claim this territory. Eliminate them in order to protect your people.
STYLE.victory_text: You have defeated all of the nomad tribes.
STYLE.defeat_text: You were unable to defeat all of the nomad tribes.

STYLE.title: Speech of the Supreme Leader
STYLE.description: The Supreme Leader wants to spread his concepts to people on this land. He must be protected until his speed was heard by everyone.
STYLE.victory_text: You have protected the Supreme Leader!
STYLE.defeat_text: You have failed to protect the Supreme Leader!

STYLE.title: Metal Rush!
STYLE.description: The natives in this region are unable to collect Metal, but have a great need for it. They will give their allegiance to whichever nation proves it can collect Metal the fastest. Be the first to collect the amount of Metal the natives desire.
STYLE.defeat_text: You did not collect enough Metal.
